amendment.description: To provide that veterans with service-connected disabilities rated as total by virtue of unemployability shall be covered by the termination of the phase-in of concurrent receipt of retired pay and veterans disability compensation for military retirees.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2441 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2441 proposed by Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S12488-12489; text: CR S12489) To provide that veterans with service-connected disabilities rated as total by virtue of unemployability shall be covered by the termination of the phase-in of concurrent receipt of retired pay and veterans disability compensation for military retirees.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2441 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2441 proposed by Senator Reid.
